newsitem.title: USA: Spyglass to expand European operations.
newsitem.headline: Spyglass to expand European operations.

text.p: Spyglass Inc said Monday it plans to expand its European operations to meet greater demand for its embedded and infrastructure technology and services.
The company added three positions, bringing its full-time staff in Europe to four, Spyglass said.
Nick Morse, sales director, is responsible for the continuing development of Spyglass sales in Europe, the Middle East and Africa, the company said.

Carl Taylor will be senior systems engineer and Terry Prime director of professional services, will be responsible for managing consultancy projects, custom engineering and porting services for Spyglass Europe, Soyglass said.
Spyglass shares were unchanged at 7-13/16 Monday.
